step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Try to keep your hands lightly on your abdomen to feel the movement.
You're placing your hands on your abdomen. Focus on a gentle touch to better sense the expansion.
You're inhaling through your nose and tightening your body. Remember to visualize the fluid moving towards your chest.
You're exhaling through your mouth and relaxing. Keep visualizing pushing the fluid out as you exhale.

exercise_summary: Great job with your deep breathing! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. Keep visualizing the fluid movement to help with drainage.
